  • Exceptions 
    Exceptions Description
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBMissingParameterException
    Unused, will be removed in Jaybird 5
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.DatabaseParameterBufferExtension.EXTENSION_PARAMETERS
    Will be removed in Jaybird 5 without formal replacement
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.DatabaseParameterBufferExtension.MAPPING_PATH
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.DatabaseParameterBufferExtension.NO_RESULT_SET_TRACKING
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.DatabaseParameterBufferExtension.OCTETS_AS_BYTES
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.DatabaseParameterBufferExtension.PARANOIA_MODE
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.isc_dpb_mapping_path
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.isc_dpb_no_result_set_tracking
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.isc_dpb_octets_as_bytes
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.isc_dpb_paranoia_mode
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.isc_isc_sql_dialect_conflict_num
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ISCConstants.SQL_DEC_FIXED
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.escape.FBSQLParseException.SQL_STATE_INVALID_ESCAPE_SEQ
    Use SQLStateConstants.SQL_STATE_INVALID_ESCAPE_SEQ; will be removed in Jaybird 5.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.JaybirdSqlLexer.tokenNames
    Use JaybirdSqlLexer.VOCABULARY instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.JaybirdSqlParser.tokenNames
    Use JaybirdSqlParser.VOCABULARY instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.JaybirdStatementModel.EXECUTE_TYPE
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBAbstractCommonDataSource.getDatabase()
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBAbstractCommonDataSource.getUserName()
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBAbstractCommonDataSource.setDatabase​(String)
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBAbstractCommonDataSource.setUserName​(String)
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBSimpleDataSource.getDatabaseName()
    use FBSimpleDataSource.getDatabase() instead for the sake of naming compatibility.
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBSimpleDataSource.getUser()
    use FBSimpleDataSource.getUserName() instead for the sake of naming compatibility.
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBSimpleDataSource.setDatabaseName​(String)
    use FBSimpleDataSource.setDatabase(String) instead for the sake of naming compatibility.
    org.firebirdsql.ds.FBSimpleDataSource.setUser​(String)
    use FBSimpleDataSource.setUserName(String) instead for the sake of naming compatibility.
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getCharacterSetSize​(int)
    Use the information provided by the EncodingDefinition returned by EncodingFactory.getEncodingDefinitionByCharacterSetId(int)
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getEncoding​(String)
    Use EncodingFactory.getEncodingForCharsetAlias(String, Encoding)
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getIscEncoding​(String)
    Use EncodingFactory.getEncodingDefinitionByCharsetAlias(String)
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getIscEncodingSize​(String)
    Use EncodingFactory.getEncodingDefinitionByFirebirdName(String) and EncodingDefinition.getMaxBytesPerChar()
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getJavaEncoding​(String)
    org.firebirdsql.encodings.EncodingFactory.getJavaEncodingForAlias​(String)
    Use EncodingFactory.getEncodingDefinitionByCharsetAlias(String) and EncodingDefinition.getJavaEncodingName()
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.AbstractFbStatement.getFieldDescriptor()
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.AbstractFbStatement.setFieldDescriptor​(RowDescriptor)
    Use AbstractFbStatement.setRowDescriptor(RowDescriptor) instead; will be removed in Jaybird 5
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.FbConnectionProperties.fromDpb​(DatabaseParameterBuffer)
    TODO: This method is only intended to simplify migration of the protocol implementation and needs to be removed.
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.FbStatement.getFieldDescriptor()
    Use FbStatement.getRowDescriptor() instead; will be removed in Jaybird 5
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ParameterBufferHelper.DpbParameterType.parseDpbString​(Object)
    In general, ParameterBufferHelper.DpbParameterType.parseDpbString(String) should be used; this method is not planned for removal
    org.firebirdsql.gds.ParameterBufferHelper.parseDpbString​(String, Object)
    In general, ParameterBufferHelper.parseDpbString(String, String) should be used; this method is not planned for removal
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.getBlobBufferLength()
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.getBlobBufferSize()
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.getLocalEncoding()
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.getCharSet() instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.getTransactionIsolation()
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.getDefaultTransactionIsolation()
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.getTransactionIsolationName()
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.getDefaultIsolation()
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.setBlobBufferLength​(int)
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.setBlobBufferSize(int)
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.setLocalEncoding​(String)
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.setCharSet(String) instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.setTransactionIsolation​(Integer)
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.setDefaultTransactionIsolation(int)
    org.firebirdsql.jca.FBManagedConnectionFactory.setTransactionIsolationName​(String)
    use FBManagedConnectionFactory.setDefaultIsolation(String)
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.AbstractCallableStatement.getBigDecimal​(int, int)
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.AbstractPreparedStatement.setUnicodeStream​(int, InputStream, int)  
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.AbstractResultSet.getBigDecimal​(int, int)
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.AbstractResultSet.getUnicodeStream​(int)  
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBConnection.setTransactionParameters​(int, int[])
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBConnectionProperties.getDatabaseParameterBuffer()
    TODO Usage of this method should be removed or revised as current use of default encoding is not correct.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDatabaseMetaData.hasNoWildcards​(String)
    Will be removed in Jaybird 5
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDatabaseMetaData.stripEscape​(String)
    Will be removed in Jaybird 5
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBSQLException.getInternalException()
    use Throwable.getCause() instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.field.FBField.isType​(FieldDescriptor, int)
    This method will be removed in Jaybird 5, as a replacement use JdbcTypeConverter.isJdbcType(FieldDescriptor, int)
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FirebirdConnection.setTransactionParameters​(int, int[])
    use FirebirdConnection.setTransactionParameters(int, TransactionParameterBuffer) instead.
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.JaybirdSqlLexer.getTokenNames()
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.JaybirdSqlParser.getTokenNames()
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.StatementParser.parseInsertStatement​(String)
    Use StatementParser.parseStatement(String) instead; will be removed in Jaybird 5
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.parser.StatementParserImpl.parseInsertStatement​(String)
    org.firebirdsql.management.FBMaintenanceManager.listLimboTransactions()
    org.firebirdsql.management.FBServiceManager.executeServicesOperation​(ServiceRequestBuffer)
    Use FBServiceManager.executeServicesOperation(FbService, ServiceRequestBuffer).
    org.firebirdsql.management.FBTraceManager.loadConfigurationFromFile​(String)
    org.firebirdsql.management.MaintenanceManager.listLimboTransactions()
    Use MaintenanceManager.limboTransactionsAsList() or MaintenanceManager.getLimboTransactions() instead; this method will be removed in Jaybird 5.
    org.firebirdsql.management.TraceManager.loadConfigurationFromFile​(String)
    We suggest you use standard Java functionality instead (eg new String(Files.readAllBytes(Paths.get(fileName)), Charset.defaultCharset()). This method will be removed in Jaybird 5.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.firebirdsql.gds.impl.argument.StringArgument​(int, ArgumentType, String)
    org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBSQLException​(String, SQLException)
    In all most all cases use FBSQLException(String, String) in combination with SQLException.setNextException(SQLException).
